__e: If you talk well of me to your Communist friends, and promise not to shoot Hoffmann at the hotel, I'll tell you what I know.
She has always been warned about Communists, and now... she'll keep well out of our way.
You know that if we didn't sell these weapons the Communists would.
Looks like the communists won after all.
If the Communists have the slightest idea what you're after, you're dead.
"You know what the communists did to my country?"
